channel.title: Smelting Interface Help
channel.description:
So I've downloaded lins interface editor and I've brought up the smelting interface to edit. (2400) my question is this.. how can I add another bar to include all of them + my dragon bar option? is there a way to make the interface scroll left and right? or will adding on just distort the interface?
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/x5733a.png[/img]
Also after I create an interface, how can I update it inside my cache?

item.title: Smelting Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:550345”]To add onto what Zymus said, the item container is already added. You just need to create another element within the container (See all the “Model” elements, yeah, those).

Getting the dragon bar to show in the container would be in your server, using the item on interface packet.[/quote]

Yes, this as well, because by default, I believe it’s either empty, or shows bronze bars.

Read full topic

item.title: Smelting Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

To add onto what Zymus said, the item container is already added. You just need to create another element within the container (See all the “Model” elements, yeah, those).

Getting the dragon bar to show in the container would be in your server, using the item on interface packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Smelting Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

You’d have to pack the interface back into the cache. Use Tom’s Cache Suite, then once you’re in it, load your cache folder, edit JaGeX archives, then go to interface.jag. You’d then have to replace the current interface file in your cache with the one you edited.

Read full topic

item.title: Smelting Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @veraflows veraflows
item.description:
@veraflows wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:2, topic:550345”]You can’t change the width. Well, you can change the width, but now it won’t fit in the chatbox. So the other option is to decrease the amount of space between the models and text. So instead of

Bronze<20px>Iron<20px>Silver<20px>

You do

Bronze<10px>Iron<10px>Silver<10px>

Or lower. You’ll need to fiddle with it a little bit. But everything looks to be there. The two sprites are probably the swords, the text is the title, the item group though, you’ll have to add your dragon bar Item I think, and add the model to it (or give it a model slot), and then add another text element for “Dragon”[/quote]

once I update this interface, how can I update my cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Smelting Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You can’t change the width. Well, you can change the width, but now it won’t fit in the chatbox. So the other option is to decrease the amount of space between the models and text. So instead of

Bronze<20px>Iron<20px>Silver<20px>

You do

Bronze<10px>Iron<10px>Silver<10px>

Or lower. You’ll need to fiddle with it a little bit. But everything looks to be there. The two sprites are probably the swords, the text is the title, the item group though, you’ll have to add your dragon bar Item I think, and add the model to it (or give it a model slot), and then add another text element for “Dragon”

Read full topic
